name: office-add-in-auth-graph-react
title: Get OneDrive data using Microsoft Graph and msal.js in an Office Add-in
shortDescription: Learn how to build a Microsoft Office Add-in, as a single-page application (SPA) with no backend, that connects to Microsoft Graph, finds the first three workbooks stored in OneDrive for Business, fetches their filenames, and inserts the names into an Office document using Office.js.
longDescription: Learn how to build a Microsoft Office Add-in, as a single-page application (SPA) with no backend, that connects to Microsoft Graph, finds the first three workbooks stored in OneDrive for Business, fetches their filenames, and inserts the names into an Office document using Office.js.

references.name: Authorize to Microsoft Graph from an Office Add-in
references.description: Your add-in can get authorization to Microsoft Graph data by obtaining an access token to Microsoft Graph from the Microsoft identity platform.
